AVSEC ORDER  05 / 2001 
 
SUB : 
FRISKING OF PERSON AND CHECKING OF HAND 
BAGGAGE 
 
 
In exercise of the powers, conferred by Section 5A of the Aircraft Act, 
1934 (XXII of 1934) delegated to him by the Central Government vide the 
Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation notification number S.O. 1797, 
dated the 3rd July, 1997, the Commissioner of the Security, Civil Aviation, for the 
purpose of security of the aircraft operations, directs that the airlines operators 
operating to / from Indian airports shall ensure that the following paragraph is 
printed on the back of the boarding passes, issued to the passengers: 
 
 
“Frisking of person and checking of hand baggage is 
mandatory for all passengers.  Passengers are requested to 
cooperate with the security staff”.     
(VEERANNA AIVALLI) 
COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CIVIL AVIATION) 
 
(REF: NO.CAS-26 (1)/91/Div-I Dated 14.09.2001)
